channel.title: Runescape private server (error connecting to server), need HELP!
channel.description: I just made a private server, combatscape, and when the log in screen comes up, I type in my desired user-name and password and it says error connecting to server. There is no slot that ask for me to put in my IP so I don't know if that is the issue or not. Can anyone help me with this problem, so I can actually log on?

item.title: Runescape private server (error connecting to server), need HELP!
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

http://www.cafeaulait.org/javatutorial.html#xtocid2801972
This is a good place to start for java coding, and get netbeans 7.0 IDE to code with.

item.title: Runescape private server (error connecting to server), need HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zaxiva zaxiva
item.description:
@zaxiva wrote:

Thanks for all the info. I figured out the problem. Yes, I guess I am “leeching” the client, as you would say, but only for informational purposes. I would like to figure out coding and have a project to work with before I just into the unknown and attempt to make for myself my own ps from scratch.

item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

It’s more if the I don’t like people are take credits for other peoples thing, and mostly I was saying that he did not “make” combattscape, he is using it for his source, and if he would have said “a I am using or leeching combattscape” I would have been fine with it

OT: if you are in GUI or egui then search for ip, and change that to 0.0.0.0, also sometimes u have to put 0.0.0.0 like 3 different times in some servers

item.source: Runescape private server (error connecting to server), need HELP!

item.title: Runescape private server (error connecting to server), need HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Mi_K_ey Mi K ey
item.description:
@Mi_K_ey wrote:

More Adv. Tutorial from ravens:

1.) Open your Client.
2.) Search for “Client.java”
3.) CTRL + F on Client.java search for One of the things that Raven Mentioned.
4.) Replace that with Your Server IP
5.) Compile with your JDK
IF you can’t find it there. Search under the file
GUI.java or EGUI.java.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape private server (error connecting to server), need HELP!

item.title: Runescape private server (error connecting to server), need HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

go to client.java, search for “ip” “no-ip.biz” “43594” “127.0.01” “server =”
just keep searching these at least one of them will work ;D

Read full topic
